name: Orange Shirt Man's Quest for 100 Watermelons
name_original: Orange Shirt Man's Quest for 100 Watermelons
description:
For the most optimal (Unoptimal???) experience, download the executable version!

Orange man has gotten a challenge from Mr. Watermelon to find him somewhere. If he does, he will win 100 watermelons. Guide Orange Man on this (horrible) quest to find Mr. Watermelon!

Check out how the game was made here!
